Title: Killclaw the Terrible
Description:
<You see a crude sign made by the ogres. It contains a warning.>

BIG bear! Bad!

Big bear guard big ogre treasure!

Kill after ritual! Get treasure, make more power!
PortraitGiverText: Killclaw is a strong beast, you'll need some friends to defeat it!
ObjectivesCompletionText: Look for the treasure within Killclaw's cave.
RewardText: <You find a cache of treasure, just like the ogres' sign mentioned!>
